sentences.cn: 空气沉闷不通风的房间

sentences.en: Aromatic capsules are great for easing the discomfort of a stuffy nose.
sentences.cn: 芳香胶囊对缓解鼻塞有奇效。

sentences.en: Don't be so stuffy — of cause they can use the same bedroom.
sentences.cn: 别那么古板——当然他们可以用同一间卧室.

sentences.en: Everything seems so jolly at home, even this stuffy old London.
sentences.cn: 国内什么事似乎有趣极了, 连这个沉闷的老伦敦也是一样.

sentences.en: Fred and Volodia sweltered at night in the stuffy, crowded cabins.
sentences.cn: 弗雷德和博洛迪亚晚上挤在不通风的船舱里热得要命。

sentences.en: He is learned, but neither stuffy nor pedantic.
sentences.cn: 他很博学, 但既不妄自尊大也不卖弄学问.

sentences.en: I got along fine with Crim , but he was a little stuffy.
sentences.cn: 我和克里姆相处很好, 但他的脾气有点躁.

sentences.en: I wouldn't be found dead in their stuffy old Union Club!
sentences.cn: 我死也不愿意参加他们的死气沉沉的联合俱乐部.

sentences.en: It was hot and stuffy in the classroom.
It was so stuffy in the tent that we could sense the air was heavy with moisture.
sentences.cn: 帐篷里很闷热,我们感到空气都是潮的.

sentences.en: It’s getting stuffy in here – do you mind if I open the window?
sentences.cn: 这里越来越闷了，我开开窗行吗？

sentences.en: It's really hot and stuffy in here.
Must we visit those stuffy people?
sentences.cn: 我们非得拜访那些自以为是的人 吗 ?

sentences.en: The room was so stuffy that one could hardly breathe.
sentences.cn: 屋里太闷,憋得人透不过气来.

sentences.en: The stuffy "50s gave way to the swinging "60s.
sentences.cn: 古板乏味的50年代被多姿多彩的60年代所取代。

sentences.en: Why were grown-ups always so stuffy and slow to recognize good ideas?
sentences.cn: 为什么成年人总是那么一本正经，对好点子反应那么迟缓呢？

trans.tran_cn: 闷热的，不通气的，古板的，保守的，枯燥无味的，一本正经的
trans.tran_en: (of a building, room, etc.) warm in an unpleasant way and without enough fresh air
